.. contents::

Change history
**************

Changelog
=========

0.1 (09-13-10)
-------------------

- Initial release

0.2 (09-13-10)
-------------------

- Added doctest

0.3 (09-13-10)
-------------------

- More detailed doctest (also used as readme)

0.4 (09-16-10)
-------------------

- Fixed a typo in the doctest
- Changed get_realm_status(self, name) and get_realm_type(self, name) to (self, *names)
